name: Iron Ore
description: A metal ore. Stronger than bronze when refined.

name: Coal
description: A fuel rich in carbon. Burns hotter than wood.

name: Iron Ingot
description: A block of refined iron. The foundation of iron age.

name: Steel
description: An alloy of iron and carbon. Stronger than iron.

name: Iron Sword
description: A weapon made from iron. Superior to bronze.

name: Iron Axe
description: A tool made from iron. More durable than bronze.

name: Iron Spear
description: A weapon made from iron.

name: Iron Shield
description: A defensive item made from iron.

name: Iron Armor
description: Protective clothing made from iron.

name: Iron Helmet
description: Protective headgear made from iron.

name: Iron Nail
description: A fastener made from iron.

name: Iron Chain
description: A series of connected iron links.

name: Iron Lock
description: A device for securing doors and chests.

name: Iron Key
description: A tool for operating locks.

name: Anvil
description: A heavy iron block for shaping metal.

name: Forge
description: A furnace for heating and working metal.

name: Hammer
description: A tool for shaping metal.

name: Tongs
description: A tool for holding hot metal.

name: File
description: A tool for smoothing and shaping metal.

name: Drill
description: A tool for making holes in materials.

name: Horseshoe
description: A metal shoe for horses. Protects hooves.

name: Iron Plow
description: A farming tool made from iron. More efficient than bronze.

name: Iron Hoe
description: A tool for farming made from iron.

name: Iron Scythe
description: A tool for harvesting crops.

name: Water Mill
description: A mill powered by water. Used for grinding grain.

name: Windmill
description: A mill powered by wind. Used for grinding grain.

name: Mechanical Clock
description: A device that measures time using gears.

name: Gear
description: A toothed wheel that transmits motion.

name: Pulley
description: A wheel with a rope. Used for lifting heavy objects.

name: Lever
description: A simple machine for moving heavy objects.

name: Wedge
description: A simple tool for splitting materials.

name: Screw
description: A threaded fastener. Used for joining materials.

name: Spring
description: A device that stores mechanical energy.

name: Catapult
description: A siege weapon that launches projectiles.

name: Ballista
description: A large crossbow-like siege weapon.

name: Siege Tower
description: A mobile structure for attacking fortifications.

name: Battering Ram
description: A large log for breaking down gates.

name: Crossbow
description: A ranged weapon more powerful than a bow.

name: Longbow
description: A powerful bow for long-range combat.

name: Arrows
description: Projectiles for bows and crossbows.

name: Chainmail
description: Protective armor made from interlocked rings.

name: Plate Armor
description: Protective armor made from metal plates.

name: Shield
description: A defensive item for blocking attacks.

name: Sword
description: A bladed weapon for close combat.

name: Axe
description: A weapon and tool with a blade.

name: Spear
description: A long weapon with a pointed tip.

name: Dagger
description: A short bladed weapon.

name: Mace
description: A weapon with a heavy head on a handle.

name: War Hammer
description: A weapon combining a hammer and a spike.

name: Book
description: A bound collection of written pages.
